briefTitle: Breast: Recovery After Axillary Node Clearance - Evaluating Limbs With E-Technology (the BRACELET Study)
officialTitle: Breast: Recovery After Axillary Node Clearance - Evaluating Limbs With E-Technology (the BRACELET Study)
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Breast or axillary surgery

Exclusion Criteria:

* Other diagnosed movement disorder
* Cannot consent due to language or capacity
